argument.name: State
argument.description: The name of the state containing the specified ZIP code.

argument.name: zip5
argument.description: A 5 or 9 digit ZIP code. The function truncates 9 digit codes to 5 digits.

page.description: Contacts the USPS web site and looks up the state for the specified 5 digit zip code.
page.discussion: The USPS_State_From_ZIP() function contacts the USPS web site and looks up the state containing the specified ZIP code. It then returns the state that contains the specified ZIP code. Note : Use of this function requires an active Internet connection. ZIP codes are used by the US Postal Service (USPS) for addressing mail in the United States.
